row.Docu: This include is used to build power CLI commands for connect/disconnect to vCenter server as per the specified inputs.

row.process:
:SET &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# = "connect-VIServer" ! Buidling Connect command ! Server IP : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "&TEMP_OPTION_VALUE#" = "&UC4RB_VSP_SERVER_IP#" : SET &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#, " -Server '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'") ! USERNAME : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "&TEMP_OPTION_VALUE#" = "&UC4RB_VSP_USERNAME#" : SET &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#, " -Username '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'") ! PORT : IF &UC4RB_VSP_PORT# <> "" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "&TEMP_OPTION_VALUE#" = "&UC4RB_VSP_PORT#" : SET &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#, " -Port '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'") : ENDIF ! PROTOCOL : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "&TEMP_OPTION_VALUE#" = "&UC4RB_VSP_PROTOCOL#" : SET &UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VSP_CONNECT_CMDLET#, " -Protocol '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'")
! Buidling Disconnect command : SET &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET# = "disconnect-VIServer " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_VMWARE_VSPHERE.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "&TEMP_OPTION_VALUE#" = "&UC4RB_VSP_SERVER_IP#" : SET &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET#, " -Server '&UC4RB_VSP_VSPHERE_ESC_VALUE#'") ! USERNAME : SET &UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_VSP_DISCONT_CMDLET#, " -Confirm:$false -Force:$false")
